description: May be we don?t have so many reviews yet, because we just joined Tripadvisor recently, but anyway let?s talk about us: Ali Adventure Egypt is a registered Tour service company in Egypt, is owned and managed by Mohammad Ali, who has been in the tourism industry in Cairo for nearly 20 years, He has a Master?s degree in Egyptology from Helwan University, located in the city of Cairo, and he is a certified tour guide for the country of Egypt. Ali has worked for several well-known tour companies (including Road Scholar Travel, Viking River Cruises, Grand Circle Travel, Overseas Adventure Travel, and Oceana Cruise Lines) and has won many awards recognized in the United States. He has been invited to a variety of US cities and universities to offer lectures on Egyptian history. When between tours, Ali has had the opportunity to work with Zahi Hawass, an archaeologist, Egyptologist, and former Minister of State for Antiquities Affairs. Ali brings his passion for his native history, as well as years of experience as a tour guide to Ali Adventure. He promises to offer all who join him the trip and education of a lifetime. With Ali Adventure Egypt you will get the followings: - - Tailor made tours, - Remarkable value, our all-inclusive prices have no hidden costs. Compare the price of one of our programs to what it would cost to duplicate the experience on your own (if that's even possible) and you'll see what we mean by "remarkable value." - The educational focus of Ali Adventure programs makes us completely different from a commercial travel tour. Ali Adventure program offer educational experiences that answer the ?what's,? the ?why's? and the ?how-to's.? - We offer exceptional educational experiences and we have made connections with educators and other local "insiders" all over Egypt, creating learning opportunities that show you Egypt in a way that just can't be done on your own or on a "tour." - From expert-led lectures and field trips, to comfortable lodgings and meals - we handle all the details (including the ones you might not anticipate.) We've taken the worry out of the planning, so you can focus on your learning experience.

description:
Embark on a once-in-a-lifetime adventure with Sindbad Submarines, the only real submarines in Africa. Out of only 14 recreational submarines worldwide, two are here in Hurghada, Egypt, ready to take you on an unforgettable journey 25 meters below the sea. Explore 500 meters of stunning coral reef and meet the fascinating marine inhabitants of the Red Sea.

Relax in the air-conditioned comfort and safety of our submarine, equipped with 44 passenger seats, two pilots' seats, and spacious round viewing windows for passengers to admire the breathtaking views. Discover the beauty of the underwater world without getting wet and create memories that will last a lifetime.

We make your experience effortless, with point-to-point transfer from your hotel to our terminal, including land-sea transportation, all while providing an exceptional level of service. Book now and experience a truly unique adventure in the Red Sea with Sindbad Submarines.

description: When you want more than just a holiday, come to Dive Point Red Sea. The choice is yours. We are convinced we have every opportunity to give you the holiday you want and deserve. Make your next trip, your best ever! 1992 saw the establishment of the location where thousands have learned to dive or taken the life changing step towards becoming a diving professional, and where hundreds return regularly to enjoy the highest quality of service and the attention of dedicated staff, Dive Point Red Sea. Wherever you are staying in Hurghada and Sahl Hasheesh, we can offer our services to you with FREE transfers from all the hotels. Transfers from the Makadi Bay area are available as well for a nominal daily charge. No matter if you would like to go for daily dive or snorkelling trips onboard our own spacious boats, to one of the more than 60 fabulous snorkel & dive sites around Hurghada, or want to become a diver or a diving instructor or would like to explore the deeper areas with Trimix & CCRs - we offer it all! The complete range of PADI (Recreational and Technical Diving), DAN, IART, IANTD, TDI & RAID courses is available from introductory levels up to Instructor qualifications. Our dedicated and service oriented staff team is the most experienced in the training of PADI Professionals in the Red Sea, consisting of 3 PADI Course Directors and 6 IDC Staff and Master Instructors working fulltime in the field of Instructor training. One example of our continuously developing customer service is the large investment we made in a Nitrox membrane system. The safety of our guests is our major priority and for this reason all Nitrox certified divers, receive SINCE 2001 Nitrox 32 FOR FREE in our dive centers! As a TDI training facility offering also PADI, IART, IANTD & RAID training up to Advanced Trimix Diver we are in the same time THE experts for rebreather diving in Hurghada! Ambient Pressure Inspiration & Evolution, JJ-CCR, Hollis Explorer & Prism2, Poseidon Se7en & ISC Megalodon Rebreathers are available in our rental department including spare parts & service facilities. We have an extensive stock of technical diving rental equipment, a gas filling station with Helium and Oxygen fills up to 250 bar, everything you could possibly want. Top quality storage and cleaning facilities for guest equipment are right in the diving centre as well as toilets and fresh water showers. A complete workshop with trained technicians offers the chance of equipment fixing and servicing. The setup is completed by a full dive store, which offers diving equipment for sale and in the middle of the centre is the "50 BAR Safety Stop" Tiki Bar for the time in between or after dives. All facilities have been planned and constructed by us! As PADI 5 Star Career Development Centers and 5 Star IDC Centers respectively we are able to offer a large variety of services and activities for divers, future divers and non-divers alike. Our goal every day is to provide you with an unforgettable holiday. Its time you chose Dive Point Red Sea!
name: Dive Point Red Sea

Historia draws on the element of the legendary boat?s past, besides a subtle nod to the roots and heritage of Egyptian culture.
Summoning the sophistication of Agatha Christie?s extensive repertoire of characters, the Historia cruise embraces the life of high-brow society. You can see the Egyptian-inspired furniture throughout the cruise as a glorious draw to the heritage of the land, with perforated rattan screens to allow an interplay of light and shadow and give a soft, diffuse glow to the surroundings.
